short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that captures audio from the microphone and rephrases your speech the way a native speaker would express it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AI-powered tool accesses your microphone, suggests idioms, and rephrases your speech to sound like a fluent English speaker.
